item.title: Persiapan Vim plug
item.description: Persiapan Vim Plug get name file ide buat file untuk kode (dipisah pisah) function ditaruh di plug if else hugo : get file path search content bvE help v/foo $^0 20gg :20 t \w|\W or f use ; ctrl+d scroll down ctrl+u scroll up shift-` uppercase | lowerchase

item.title: Persiapan Portfolio
item.description: persiapan portfolio front end get data profile, repo typing css/js grid auto auto transform translate intersection observe js flip card (see serabi theme) animation sosis/sus display fixed backend (use) hugo template kayak biasa hugo template api (if content change) tailwind laravel mix, webpack, babel, sass (if style change) backend (not use) folder : src : script : script.js sass.js deploy server config api template : index.
